items.item_text: The public may address the Board on agenda items not appearing on the agenda.  Only those who have filled out a comment card before the meeting is called to order will be called upon to speak. Each speaker will be allotted three (3) minutes unless the number of speakers will exceed the thirty minute allotment then the three minute allotment will be adjusted accordingly.  The Board will not respond nor take action on any non- agendized item comments at this time, although the item may be agendized at a later date    (Ed. Code 35145.5). The comments shall be made from the podium. The Board shall limit the total time for all public comments to 30 minutes. Please refrain from any response to the speaker including negative and positive reactions (booing and clapping). This will ensure all members of the public feel free to voice their opinions and concerns.
